title: Teen, man shot at Florida City residence
content:
SXC
FLORIDA CITY, Fla. - A teenager and a man were shot Sunday morning inside a Florida City home, officials said.
The shooting took place at about 6 a.m. in the 400 block of Northwest 15th Street.
2 driven to hospital after Florida City shooting
The older victim has been identified as Kenneth Hubert, 20, and the younger victim is a 16-year-old boy, officials said.
The teen was shot in the foot.
Both victims were taken to an area hospital. Their conditions were not immediately known.
The cause of the shooting is under investigation.
